Sentence.value: Agoraphobia sometimes occurs when a person has had a panic attack and begins to fear situations that might lead to another panic attack.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Agoraphobia|C0001818]] sometimes occurs when a [[person|C0027361]] has had a [[panic attack|C0086769]] and begins to fear situations that might lead to another [[panic attack|C0086769]].
